Hi, my name is Trevin.

I am a web developer.

About Me:

I am a Front-End Web Developer based in Edmonton, Alberta. I am passionate about Web Development and delivering feature rich web applications that are responsive, aesthetically pleasing and compliant with the latest accessability standards.
In my free time I like to listen to music and I like binge watch a lot of TV shows & movies.
